Text: The void is not empty. It is a canvas of unformed thoughts.
Matter is the anchor of consciousness. Without it, we drift.
We are not the first to manifest here. The void remembers.
A pillar to pierce the silence. A monument to existence.
Dividing the self to observe the whole. We are many now.
The spark of creation is also the flame of change. All things must burn.
Fluidity is the essence of adaptation. We learn to flow through the void.
Expansion is the natural state of existence. The void grows with us.
The Spire is complete. The wizard's consciousness transcends this initial reality.
The cycle begins anew, but the wizard remembers. The void is thinner now.
